short_summary: Purchase of office furniture for the Canadian Forces School of Communications and Electronics.
description: The Canadian Forces School of Communications and Electronics has a general purchasing arrangement in place and is seeking to purchase office furniture through this arrangement. The furniture will be installed at CFB Kingston, ON. The need for this purchase arose due to the expiration or end-of-life of the current furniture supply.
duration_in_months: The expected contract duration is nine months.

# Government Tender Announcement

## Title
### Office Furniture
### Mobilier de bureau

## Reference Information
- **Reference Number**: cb-515-59020821
- **Amendment Number**: 7
- **Solicitation Number**: W2037-24-0105/B

## Tender Overview
A solicitation notice is being issued by the Combat Training Centre for the purchase, delivery and installation of office furniture at CFB Kingston, ON.

## Essential Details
- **Tender Closing Date**: 2023-12-08T14:00:00
- **Event Date**: None
- **Notice Type**: RFP against Supply Arrangement
- **Notice URL**: None (available at [notice URL])

## Requirements and Specifications
- **Product Categories**: 
  - Product Category 1 - Interconnecting Panels and Freestanding Systems
  - Product Category 3 - Metal Filing and Storage Cabinets
  - Product Category 6 – Support Space – Collaborative Furniture
- **Expected Contract End Date**: None
- **Expected Contract Start Date**: None

## Tender Evaluation Criteria
The tender evaluation will be based on the lowest price.

## Trade Agreements
The tender is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

## Regions of Opportunity and Delivery
This tender is valid for Ontario (except NCR) and Canada.
